Activity: Check emails. Review the data quality reporting process flowchart.
Meet with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to review the data quality reporting process and flowchart. Discuss their feedback and suggestions for improvement. Take notes on their recommendations.

Create a formal document outlining the data quality reporting process. Include a detailed description of the steps involved, the roles and responsibilities, the reporting channels, and the escalation procedures. Document all changes made based on feedback from clinicians and QA.

Prepare a short presentation summarizing the data quality reporting process. This presentation will be used to train staff on the new process. Plan for tomorrow's activities: Focus on addressing any final feedback and preparing training materials.
